message.content:
cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.SOC, cs.IR, cs.CL 

This paper deals with the sampling of a language-based Twitter follow network and the identification of influential accounts within it. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.SI (Social and Information Networks). The paper also involves data mining and analysis of the network structure, which could fall under cs.SD (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval). The identification of topical communities within the network could also be categorized under cs.SOC (Social and Behavioral Sciences). Finally, the paper involves natural language processing to some extent, which could fall under cs.CL (Computation and Language).
